splotches on your beanie to create a chu chu effect start a color change to the base color at random intervals throughout the beanie on following row make these color changes last more or less stitches directly below the original color change creating splotches do this throughout the beanie y a r n g u i d e this pattern should work with any yarn and hook size as long as you follow the directions to fit your head i used 4mm and 6mm hooks with medium-weight yarn 4mm for the eyes 6mm for the beanie p a t t e r n beanie using the base color of your choice round 1 in a magic_ring chain 2 12 double_crochet slip_stitch in first double_crochet round 2 chain 2 double_crochet increase 12 times slip_stitch in first double_crochet of the round round 3 chain 2 repeat around 1dc
